scripts.build-vault: mkdir -p build/vault; cp -f vault-site/index.html build/vault; browserify vault-site/vault.js -d -o build/vault/bundle.js
scripts.build-test: mkdir -p build/test; cp -f test-site/test.html build/test; browserify test-site/test.js -d -o build/test/test.built.js
scripts.build-docs: mkdir -p docs; jsdoc -R README.main.md index.js -d docs; jsdoc -R ethereum.md ethereum.js -d docs/ethereum; jsdoc -R secp256k1.md secp256k1.js -d docs/secp256k1
scripts.build-docs-private: npm run build-docs; rm -rf docs-private; cp -r docs docs-public; sed -i '' -f private-docs.sed docs-private/index.html
